Pest control: A garden hose can be used to spray insect repellent or pesticides on plants to keep pests away.
Fire extinguisher: A garden hose can be used to put out small fires or to control the spread of a fire in an emergency.
Drinking water supply: A garden hose can be used to transport water to areas without access to a water supply in the event of a natural disaster.
Watering system: A garden hose can be used as a watering system for plants, flowers, or gardens.
Pressure washer: A garden hose can be used as a pressure washer for cleaning outdoor surfaces, such as patios, decks, or driveways.
